Description: * Getting damaged during the initial launch window (0.6s) after using a Jump Pad will cause you to be stunned (similar to {{PageRef|Zipline|alt_name=ziplines}} having an initial knockoff period). When you are stunned, you will lose control and continue towards the landing destination. The stun will wear off 0.2s after landing, and then a 30% slow for 2s will apply. Damage over time does not trigger this (same damage rules as {{PageRef|Zipline|alt_name=ziplines}}).
* {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}}: Base damage reduced from 55 to 45
* {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}}: Spirit scaling increased from 0.65 to 0.75
* {{PageRef|Warp Stone}}: Bullet Resist reduced from 40% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Capacitor}}: Fire Rate reduced from 8% to 5%
* {{PageRef|Capacitor}}: Cooldown increased from 40s to 60s
* {{PageRef|Guardian Ward}}: Cooldown increased from 40s to 45s
* {{PageRef|Reactive Barrier}}: Cooldown increased from 24s to 26s
* {{PageRef|Spirit Shielding}}: Barrier reduced from 325 to 300
* {{PageRef|Spirit Shielding}}: Barrier boon scaling increased from 4 to 5
* {{PageRef|Weapon Shielding}}: Barrier reduced from 325 to 300
* {{PageRef|Weapon Shielding}}: Barrier boon scaling increased from 4 to 5
* {{PageRef|Fortitude}}: Damage taken duration to regen reduced from 14s to 13s
* {{PageRef|Trophy Collector}}: {{PageRef|Souls}} per Minute increased from 25 to 30
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Cooldown increased from 28s to 32s
* {{PageRef|Divine Barrier}}: Cooldown increased from 40s to 45s
* {{PageRef|Rusted Barrel}}: Bonus health increased from 60 to 70
* {{PageRef|Silence Wave}}: Cooldown increased from 30s to 35s (affects component)
* {{PageRef|Spirit Snatch}}: Duration reduced from 14s to 10s
* {{PageRef|Spirit Snatch}}: Bonus damage reduced from 75 to 50
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}}: Cooldown increased from 20s to 45s
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}}: Movespeed during phase reduced from 4m to 3m
* {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}}: Can no longer target an ethereal shifted ally with things like {{PageRef|Rescue Beam}}, {{PageRef|Viscous}} Cube, etc
* {{PageRef|Curse}}: Cooldown reduced from 50s to 45s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Gloom Bombs}} cooldown increased from 10s to 12s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Gloom Bombs}} base damage from 55 to 45
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Gloom Bombs}} spirit scaling reduced from 0.74 to 0.64
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Gloom Bombs}} multi bomb damage ratio increased from 50% to 65%
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} no longer replenishes stamina on usage
* Doorman: Bullet damage growth per boon reduced from 1.15 to 1.0
* Doorman: Outgoing headshot damage multiplier reduced by 25%
* Doorman: {{PageRef|Call Bell}} explosion damage spirit scaling increased from 1.5 to 1.7
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: {{PageRef|Bloodscent}} isolated kill bonus reduced from 5% to 4%
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: Base bullet damage increased from 20.9 to 21.3
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: Bullet damage growth increased from 0.52 to 0.56
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Quantum Entanglement}} Fire Rate increased from +25% to +30%
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Rejuvenating Aurora}} cooldown reduced from 48s to 45s
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: Bullet damage growth per boon reduced from 0.12 to 0.08
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Flame Dash}} T2 reduced from +35 to +30
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Afterburn}} T1 reduced from -25% Spirit Damage to -20%
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Afterburn}} T3 reduced from +28 DPS to +26
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Base regen reduced from 2 to 1
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Headshot reduction reduced from -20% to -25%
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} cooldown increased from 150s to 170s
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Medicinal Specter}} now has a 1s linger time
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: Base bullet damage reduced from 6.48 to 6.15
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|{{PageRef|Paradox}}ical Swap}} cooldown increased from 70s to 75s
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Lightning Ball}} spirit scaling increased from 0.43 to 0.55
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Alt fire knockback reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Pain Battery}} T1 and T2 swapped
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} max damage reduced from 80 to 70
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} T2 reduced from +10/50 to +8/40
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} spirit scaling increased from 0.65/0.33 to 0.8/0.4
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: Base bullet damage increased from 15 to 16.2
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Binding Word}} range increased from 19m to 20m
